ExpandtestingPracticeWebsitePage.description: This page is an Automation Testing Practice Website for QA and Developers, providing resources and examples for various automation tools and techniques.

elements.name: Search Input
elements.description: Input field to search for examples or resources.

elements.name: Test Cases Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to Test Cases examples.

elements.name: API Testing Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to API Testing examples.

elements.name: XPath / CSS Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to XPath/CSS examples.

assertions: Header text contains 'Automation Testing Practice WebSite for QA and Developers'

WebInputsPagePage.description: This page is designed to demonstrate and practice handling various web input types. It allows users to interact with different input fields and provides a platform for testing automation scripts related to input handling.

elements.name: Page Title
elements.primary_locator: role=heading[name="Web inputs page for Automation Testing Practice"]
elements.backup_locator: text="Web inputs page for Automation Testing Practice"
elements.description: The main heading of the page.

elements.name: Display Inputs Button
elements.description: Button to display the entered inputs.

elements.name: Clear Inputs Button
elements.description: Button to clear the entered inputs.

assertions: Page title is 'Web inputs page for Automation Testing Practice'

WebInputsPageForAutomationTestingPractic.description: This page is designed to practice and demonstrate web input functionalities for automation testing.

elements.name: Input Number Field
elements.description: Text field for entering numeric input.

elements.name: Input Text Field
elements.description: Text field for entering text input.

elements.name: Display Inputs Button
elements.description: Button to display the entered inputs.

elements.name: Clear Inputs Button
elements.description: Button to clear the entered inputs.

assertions: Page title is 'Web inputs page for Automation Testing Practice'
Header text is 'Web inputs page for Automation Testing Practice'
